remarks: Function-builder for derivative, finite product rule.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
dvmptfprod.iph $e |- F/ i ph $.
dvmptfprod.jph $e |- F/ j ph $.
dvmptfprod.j $e |- J = ( K |`t S ) $.
dvmptfprod.k $e |- K = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
dvmptfprod.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvmptfprod.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. J ) $.
dvmptfprod.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. Fin ) $.
dvmptfprod.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. I /\ x e. X ) -> A e. CC ) $.
dvmptfprod.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. I /\ x e. X ) -> B e. CC ) $.
dvmptfprod.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. I ) -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> A ) ) = ( x e. X |-> B ) ) $.
dvmptfprod.bc $e |- ( i = j -> B = C ) $.
dvmptfprod $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> prod_ i e. I A ) ) = ( x e. X |-> sum_ j e. I ( C x. prod_ i e. ( I \ { j } ) A ) ) ) $.
$d A j $.
$d C i $.
$d I i j x $.
$d S i j x $.
$d X i j x $.
$d ph x $.
